workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3548048111554013 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.32177416885478605 --weight-decay 0.0002896739586359809 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0006821989653784613 --lr-period-updates 55015.86428683014 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.1876593851320485 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
